title: AED Game Character Voice - The Undead
description: Rising from the grave, The Undead character voice shuffles his way into your next video game to feast upon the living!
longDescription:
Audio Demo

AED Game Character Voice - The Undead voiceover sound library provides you with more than 250+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, battle cries, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, character, and outstanding gameplay audio experiences. 

The Undead's voice profile is raspy, gritty and dripping with necromantic energy with a pronounced vocal performance. He is perfect for zombies, villains, necormancers, evil wizards, in-game non-player characters or any antagonist game characters with elements of evil or zombified tendencies. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in a clean audio format in case you want to further process with vocal effects.

Features:

  • Vocal Profile: Raspy, Gritty, Male Voice
  • Perfect for NPC's like demons, evil wizards, creatures, undead, evil spirits and film or movie based trailers.
  • Featuring 100 custom lines and 129 NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.
  • Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping, battle cries and undead vocalizations and guttural zombie screams to fully flesh out your newly created undead fiends!
  • Works with any DAW or Game Engine
  • Royalty Free and YouTube friendly
  • Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  273 male voice-over audio files
  • 66.6 MB of voice samples
  • All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format

Number of Audio Waves: 273

Number of Audio Cues: 273

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
